name: Alternative Derivatives Exchange
slogan: Regulated venue for trading alternative derivatives; backed by proprietary technology
description:
ADE helps clients hedge real world risks by offering a low cost high throughput resilient trading venue facilitated by high performance matching technology and a blockchain based clearing and settlement system.
The aforementioned technology stack is currently marketed on a SaaS basis to various venues. 
The products ADE intents to list include: Digital Asset Futures, Hashing Futures, Weather Futures, Freight Futures and deliverable Gold Futures. Our technology is complete and currently marketed, the funding support we are now looking for will go towards Operational Expenditure and regulatory costs. 
ADE will be fully regulated by the FCA prior to launch, once regulated ADE will offer its products to Clearing Members who in turn will onboard exiting clients making the client acquisition process extremely efficient and associated costs very low.  
The targeted client base is comprised of financial institutions, hedge funds, banks, prop shops, arcades, individuals trading their own account as well as businesses looking to hedge their respective business risks.

jobs.title: Junior C++ Developer
jobs.description:
ADE is currently looking to add a C++ junior or intern to its development team. The candidate will work directly with the CTO and will report directly to the CTO, Mr Emir Kamber. 
Emir is an expert C++ developer and a founder of ADE. With over 20 year of experience in finance building High Frequency Trading and Exchange infrastructure, Emir is an expert C++ developer. 
The candidate will be a "go-getter", hard working , inquisitive, self starter with a genuine passion and thirst for knowledge. This is a high viability position with a steep learning curve that will afford the right candidate with the opportunity for very fast career advancement. 
The initial work will be on non-critical components with additional responsibilities added depending on performance. 

This is a paid or unpaid position depending on candidate qualifications. The candidate may be from Belgrade, Serbia or London, UK.
